description: Moderate/easy hike which follows a rocky trail to a pretty lake with optional side diversion to view some magnificent old trees, one of which is known as the Candelabra Fir. This trail follows part of the Brothers Creek loop trail.There is a small parking area at Millstream and Henlow Rd. at the start of the trail with room for maybe 6 to 8 vehicles. After parking walk east through a metal gate alongside some large houses and follow the path up crossing the Baden Powell trail.
directions: Heading west along HWY 1 the Trans Canada Highway, take exit 11, 15th st. Turn right up Cross Creek Road to Highland Dr. turn left and follow Highland to Eyremount Dr. turn right at Crestline then bear left up Henlow, turn right on Millstream and park on the street or at the small parking area on the left.
title: Candelabra Fir/Lost Lake
